member.name: M:OpenMetaverse.RegistrationApi.CreateUser(OpenMetaverse.RegistrationApi.CreateUserParam)
member.summary: Returns the new user ID or throws an exception containing the error code The error codes can be found here: https://wiki.secondlife.com/wiki/RegAPIError
member.returns: The UUID of the new user account

member.name: M:OpenMetaverse.Utilities.Realism.Shoot(OpenMetaverse.GridClient,OpenMetaverse.Vector3)
member.summary: Aims at the specified position, enters mouselook, presses and releases the left mouse button, and leaves mouselook

member.name: M:OpenMetaverse.Utilities.Realism.Shoot(OpenMetaverse.GridClient)
member.summary: Enters mouselook, presses and releases the left mouse button, and leaves mouselook

member.name: M:OpenMetaverse.Utilities.Realism.Chat(OpenMetaverse.GridClient,System.String)
member.summary: A psuedo-realistic chat function that uses the typing sound and animation, types at three characters per second, and randomly pauses. This function will block until the message has been sent
member.param: A reference to the client that will chat

member.name: M:OpenMetaverse.Utilities.Realism.Chat(OpenMetaverse.GridClient,System.String,OpenMetaverse.ChatType,System.Int32)
member.summary: A psuedo-realistic chat function that uses the typing sound and animation, types at a given rate, and randomly pauses. This function will block until the message has been sent
member.param: A reference to the client that will chat
The chat type (usually Normal, Whisper or Shout)
Characters per second rate for chatting

member.name: F:OpenMetaverse.Utilities.VoiceManager.BlockingTimeout
member.summary: Amount of time to wait for the voice daemon to respond. The value needs to stay relatively high because some of the calls require the voice daemon to make remote queries before replying

member.name: M:OpenMetaverse.Utilities.VoiceManager.RequestRenderAudioStart(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Does not appear to be working
